video.title: Vue.js & Firebase Tutorial - Real-time Chat
video.description:
Create a real-time chat app using Firebase and Vue.js.

💻Code: https://github.com/webdevmatics/firebase-vuejs

Tutorial from WebDevMatics. Check out their channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjpCwTGrMRuTi4FcrCYbkSQ

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: WebDevMatics
topLevelComment.text: Glad to contribute content to your channel freeCodeCamp, thanks for  the opportunity. Thanks to all who find this video helpful. I share more videos like this on my channel if you like to check out.

topLevelComment.author: Jules Fournier
topLevelComment.text: Few problems in this video... I feel like the guy is not happy about doing a tutorial or at least his voice sounds tired. But if this was the only problem... It looks like he doesn't care about making his code clean and he does not give any tools so that we can learn by ourseleves. He is just writing his code for his app using firebase functions and everything without actually saying how they work. I feel like reading firebase and vue documentation would be more usefull. Without forgeting about the fact that it is a firebase AND vue tutorial so it should maybe explain why we should use data instead of props, or created instead of mounted, explain the vue hooks and stuff like that. It might take more time but it is a more effective way to learn. Of course if you just want to create your own chat and you don't care about improving your programming skills in any way this might be a good video for you.
